title: Stratego Single Player v1.0.5

Stratego is all about tactics, strategy and cold hard bluff, a combination of chess and poker. Millions of copies of this classic board game have been sold worldwide.

This renewed version of Stratego comes with a completely new and improved AI opponent that can be set to easy, normal and hard mode to match your tactical skills. Play as many battles as you like, and keep track of your performance in the overall statistics. What's New:
